protected java.util.ArrayList<Coordinate> getSquaredLocation(@NotNull

                                                         int size)
        Returns a list with all the coordinates forming a size X size rectangle with start as center.
        Parameters:
        start - The center of the square that will be returned.
        size - The amount of coordinates surrounding the starting coordinate.
        Returns:
        A list of coordinates surrounding the starting coordinate
